channel.title: Colorado Rock Metal Music Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Colorado Rock Metal Music Ipod on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i just woke up and i have bad breath.
item.description: work is awesome again. on friday I did a bunch of stuff getting acclimated with flash and such. kinda fun. then I got bored and wne to drop off some cds to my “boss.” he was in his office with this dude listening to music. they were listening to death from above 1979. so I hung out and we all talked about death metal for about 40 minutes. totally awesome. I love it.
